name: VTT Technical Research Centre of Finland Ltd
goal: As a fully state-owned, non-profit organisation with a specific service mandate, VTT Technical Research Centre of Finland Ltd is part of Finland's innovation system and operates under the mandate of the Ministry of Economc Affairs and Employment and receives budget funding from the state. As an impartial non-profit Research and Technology Organisation (RTO) and with the national mandate and mission to support economic competitiveness, societal development and innovation, VTT carries out research and innovation activities for the needs of industry and knowledge-based society.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Horizon 2020: Member of the national coordination group, with the task to advise the Finnish Government EU Affairs Department on sector-specific preparation of European Council meetings and on actions relating to institutional questions and general development of the EU.

Structural Funds / RIS3: Member of the Coordination Committee (MYR) within Helsinki-Uusimaa Regional Council, with the task to develop and implement the regionâ€™s Smart Specialisation Strategy

RDI policies on a broad basis: Member of EARTO European Association of Research and Technology Organisations
